192.168.2.64 / 26

11111111.11111111.11111111.11000000 - 255.255.255.192 - VLSM/Classless

11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000 - 255.255.255.0 - class C

2^2 = 4 subnets

2^6 =  64 - 2 = 62 hosts

192.168.2.0 - 192.168.2.63 - usable is .1 - .62
192.168.2.64 - 192.168.2.127 - usable is .65 - .126
192.168.2.128 - 192.168.2.191 - usable is 129 - 190
192.168.2.192 - 192.168.2.255 - usable is 193 - 254

192.168.10.0 / 24

11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000 = 255.255.255.0 - class C

2^2 = 4 subnets

2^6 = 64 -2 = 62 hosts
